changeSet.author: Maksim Balashov
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE users ( id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL, password VARCHAR(130) NOT NULL, fullname VARCHAR(17) NOT NULL, street VARCHAR(11) NOT NULL, city VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, state VARCHAR(2) NOT NULL, zip VARCHAR(12) NOT NULL, phone_number VARCHAR(9) NOT NULL, role VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL )

changeSet.author: Maksim Balashov
changeSet.sql:
CREATE TABLE taco_order ( id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, delivery_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, delivery_street VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, delivery_city VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, delivery_state VARCHAR(2) NOT NULL, delivery_zip VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, cc_number VARCHAR(16) NOT NULL, cc_expiration VARCHAR(5) NOT NULL, cc_cvv VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, user_id BIGINT, placed_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(id)
)

changeSet.author: Maksim Balashov
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE taco ( id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, taco_order_id BIGINT, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (taco_order_id) REFERENCES taco_order(id) )

changeSet.author: Maksim Balashov
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE ingredient_ref ( ingredient_id VARCHAR(4) NOT NULL, taco_id BIGINT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (ingredient_id, taco_id), FOREIGN KEY (ingredient_id) REFERENCES ingredient(id), FOREIGN KEY (taco_id) REFERENCES taco(id) )
